TopicTitle: What Mod Is This Cockpit From???

Articles.Content:
I have been searching high and low for answers to this question, so I'll keep it short.

What mod is this cold war-style jet cockpit from??????

It is the same basic cockpit but they have been blended in. Can someone please tell me which mod this is?

The nose-cone has a blunted, very dark grey tip similar to the radar cones on the sea harrier.
Looks like it might be from Firespitter, but I'm not sure about that.
No, The firespitter on is very short and is stackable.
It is from the Reaching For the Stars pack in the Realism Overhaul, by Nathan Kell.
Cheers you are my new best friend lol!
